Texts.Chs: 你是否曾停下来想过，你能及时来到这个特别的地方，背后到底汇聚了多少场巧合？
Texts.Eng: Have you ever stopped to think at just how many coincidences occurred to get you to this specific point in time?

Texts.Chs: 我不是鼻涕虫。据大多数人说，我虽然看起来不像，但实际上我属于单孔目动物家族。等我长大了，我会变得毛茸茸的。
Texts.Eng: I am not a slug. I don't look like it, according to most people, but I'm actually in the monotreme family. I will be very furry in the future, when I'm older.

Texts.Chs: 我听到一些关于科学研究的奇怪的新尝试的传闻，坦率地说，这些让我感到恐惧。
Texts.Eng: I hear rumors of some strange new forays into scientific study that, frankly, terrify me.

Texts.Chs: 我可能需要为我的员工寻找一个更好的通信专家，一个可以为我们所发现的这个奇怪的传输装置赋予意义的人...
Texts.Eng: I should probably find a better communications specialist for my Staff. Someone who can make sense of this strange transmission we found...

Texts.Chs: 我随时都能和你畅聊科学，除了现在。我饿得受不了了。
Texts.Eng: I'd love to chat about science at just about any time. Except right now. I'm too hungry.

Texts.Chs: 如果你找不到石油来制造塑料...你可以随时使用牛奶。这不算理想，但是在家徒四壁的时候能帮上忙。
Texts.Eng: If you can't find oil to make plastic...you can always use Milk. It's not optimal, but it'll do the trick in a serious bind.

Texts.Chs: 如果你发现自己急需燃料，你可以直接从水中提取氢气并使用它。当你陷入困境时，这是一根救命稻草。
Texts.Eng: If you ever find yourself in dire need of fuel, you can pull hydrogen straight from water and use that. It's a lifesaver when you're in dire straits.

Texts.Chs: 这听起来可与名字相去甚远，但科学前哨有一处繁华而多样化的市场。
Texts.Eng: It may not sound like it by name, but the Science Outpost has a bustling and varied marketplace.

Texts.Chs: 这并不是在说我不够勇敢，或者没有决心...只是...我似乎找不到干掉凯文的动机。
Texts.Eng: It's not that I am not brave, or have no backbone...I just can't seem to get the motivation to fire Kevin.

Texts.Chs: 我的大尺寸意味着我需要大量的营养。我想你没有橙子吧？ 我真的很喜欢。橙子很稀有。尤其是在现在...
Texts.Eng: My large size means I require rather absurd amounts of nutrients. I don't suppose you have an Orange? I do love those. Rare. Especially now...

Texts.Chs: 你应该多加使用你的^orange;三度仪^reset;。它会在许多方面给你带来帮助。
Texts.Eng: You should definitely make regular use of your ^orange;Tricorder^reset;. It will help you in many ways.
